scripts.rm-node-module: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf server/node_modules
scripts.install-for-dev: yarn rm-node-module && yarn install && yarn install-client
scripts.garba-cart: yarn run norma-garba && npm-run-all --parallel client server-dev
scripts.compu-cart: yarn run norma-garba && npm-run-all --parallel client server-dev
scripts.empresa-cart: yarn run norma-empresarias && npm-run-all --parallel client server-dev
scripts.mv-client-garba: rm -rf server/public/garbarino && mkdir -p server/public/garbarino && cd client && mv build/index.html ../server/public/garbarino
scripts.mv-client-compumundo: rm -rf server/public/compumundo && mkdir -p server/public/compumundo && cd client && mv build/index.html ../server/public/compumundo
scripts.mv-client-empresarias: rm -rf server/public/empresarias && mkdir -p server/public/empresarias && cd client && mv build/index.html ../server/public/empresarias
scripts.build-garbarino: yarn norma-garba && yarn build-client && yarn mv-client-garba
scripts.build-compumundo: yarn norma-compumundo && yarn build-client &&  yarn mv-client-compumundo
scripts.build-empresarias: yarn norma-empresarias && yarn build-client && yarn mv-client-empresarias
scripts.build-develop: CI=false PUBLIC_URL=//dj4i04i24axgu.cloudfront.net/cart-ui/empresarias/ci yarn build-empresarias && CI=false PUBLIC_URL=//dj4i04i24axgu.cloudfront.net/cart-ui/garbarino/ci yarn build-garbarino && CI=false PUBLIC_URL=//dj4i04i24axgu.cloudfront.net/cart-ui/compumundo/ci yarn build-compumundo
scripts.build-staging: CI=false PUBLIC_URL=//dj4i04i24axgu.cloudfront.net/cart-ui/empresarias/staging yarn build-empresarias && CI=false PUBLIC_URL=//dj4i04i24axgu.cloudfront.net/cart-ui/garbarino/staging yarn build-garbarino && CI=false PUBLIC_URL=//dj4i04i24axgu.cloudfront.net/cart-ui/compumundo/staging yarn build-compumundo
scripts.build-master: CI=false PUBLIC_URL=//dj4i04i24axgu.cloudfront.net/cart-ui/empresarias/master yarn build-empresarias && CI=false PUBLIC_URL=//dj4i04i24axgu.cloudfront.net/cart-ui/garbarino/master yarn build-garbarino && CI=false PUBLIC_URL=//dj4i04i24axgu.cloudfront.net/cart-ui/compumundo/master yarn build-compumundo
